title: SAHPRA and the Sinopharm Vaccine -
author: Ntokozo Msiza
description: SAHPRA has received documentation for the Sinopharm vaccine developed by the China National Pharmaceutical Group in China.
cleaned_text: at Updates](https://www.sahpra.org.za/category/news-and-updates/), [Press Releases](https://www.sahpra.org.za/category/press-releases/) 23 June 2021 SAHPRA has received documentation for the Sinopharm vaccine developed by the China National Pharmaceutical Group in China. SAHPRA will now commence with evaluating the data in assessing the efficacy of the vaccine.
